alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:54AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cook and northern Lake Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 354 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Basswood Lake, to near Snowbank Lake, to Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, to near Isabella, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Snowbank Lake around 400 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Little Saganaga Lake, Alpine Lake, Sea Gull Lake and Saganaga Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
